100100.Name: Born
100100.Description: The unborn child's movements are still weak, but it gets stronger with every kick.
100100.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Comeback Home

100200.Name: Gorgeous
100200.Description: An amazing title acknowledging the great deeds of its wearer.
100200.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Honorable Sacrifice

100300.Name: Dark
100300.Description: All the different shades, the blues, the greys and the black... black...! The eternal darkness surrounds you!
100300.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Black Armor

100401.Name: Sorrowful Girl
100401.Description:
The word Sorrow itself is full of sadness.
Where these boys and girls can go along with this sad feelings.
100401.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

100402.Name: Sorrowful Boy
100402.Description:
The word Sorrow itself is full of sadness.
Where these boys and girls can go along with this sad feelings.
100402.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

100403.Name: Sorrowful Girl
100403.Description:
The word Sorrow itself is full of sadness.
Where these boys and girls can go along with this sad feelings.
100403.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

100404.Name: Sorrowful Boy
100404.Description:
The word Sorrow itself is full of sadness.
Where these boys and girls can go along with this sad feelings.
100404.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

100405.Name: Sorrowful Girl
100405.Description:
The word Sorrow itself is full of sadness.
Where these boys and girls can go along with this sad feelings.
100405.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

100406.Name: Sorrowful Girl
100406.Description:
The word Sorrow itself is full of sadness.
Where these boys and girls can go along with this sad feelings.
100406.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

100500.Name: Sky
100500.Description: Clear skies give us a chance to drink in the sight of the boundless firmament and take stock of our lives.
100500.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: If you smile

100601.Name: Edge of Punishment
100601.Description: Punishment gives us the chance to acknowledge our mistakes and repent for them. This title has been awarded to you for punishing those who have shown disloyalty.
100601.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Hundred Swords

100602.Name: Bullet of Punishment
100602.Description: Punishment gives us the chance to acknowledge our mistakes and repent for them. This title has been awarded to you for punishing those who have shown disloyalty.
100602.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Hundred Swords

100603.Name: Scythe of Punishment
100603.Description: Punishment gives us the chance to acknowledge our mistakes and repent for them. This title has been awarded to you for punishing those who have shown disloyalty.
100603.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Hundred Swords

100604.Name: Fist of Punishment
100604.Description: Punishment gives us the chance to acknowledge our mistakes and repent for them. This title has been awarded to you for punishing those who have shown disloyalty.
100604.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Hundred Swords

100605.Name: Melody of Punishment
100605.Description: Punishment gives us the chance to acknowledge our mistakes and repent for them. This title has been awarded to you for punishing those who have shown disloyalty.
100605.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Hundred Swords

100606.Name: Cannon of Punishment
100606.Description: Punishment gives us the chance to acknowledge our mistakes and repent for them. This title has been awarded to you for punishing those who have shown disloyalty.
100606.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Hundred Swords

100700.Name: Stormbring
100700.Description: In this case something unseen has moved and set a great storm in motion. Make sure the storm doesn't sweep you away.

100800.Name: In Destiny
100800.Description: Believe in fate, and our lives have already been determined for us. Whether you agree with that or not lies entirely in your hands.

100910.Name: Response
100910.Description: A title for those who have kept their nerve in a crisis. Albeit with a lot of help on the side.
100910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Dealing with…?

100920.Name: Medical treatment Required
100920.Description: Too many consumables can lead to side effects. Medical check-ups are a must!
100920.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Why don't you getting a medical checkup?

100930.Name: Enchanting
100930.Description:
A title which highlights real beauty. 
Don't overuse it or you might wear it out.
100930.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You're Welcome to Consume

101010.Name: Shopaholic's
101010.Description:
Some cultures put great store in ostentatious consumption. 
Just don't forget to enjoy things in moderation!

101020.Name: Merchants' Union's
101020.Description: This title can only be used with the Merchants' Union's consent. But don't go thinking you'll get a discount!
101020.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Any discount for a regular?

101030.Name: Amazing
101030.Description: A title to show the world just how amazing you are. Awarded to you with gratitude by the Merchants' Union.
101030.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: All Mine!

101040.Name: Glorious
101040.Description: The Merchants' Union has granted you this title to highlight your VVIP status. Surely there are some little privileges to go along with it?
101040.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Merchants' Union VVIP

101110.Name: Soft
101110.Description:
You're good at patching things up. 
Just see to it that things don't fall apart on you.
101110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Being afraid of gone

101120.Name: Antique
101120.Description:
Eventually everything gets old enough to become an antique. 
The older things get, the more charm they have.
101120.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Good Old Indestructible

101130.Name: Repair Business
101130.Description: You receive this title for giving out lots of money for repairs. Excellent! Throwing things away only is so short-sighted!
101130.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Forever Repairs

101210.Name: No blanket
101210.Description: Some flowers don't take kindly to the cold... and it looks like you're one of them.
101210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Cold Floor

101220.Name: Newspaper covered
101220.Description: Only got a newspaper instead of a blanket?! Be careful, a lot of people look down on such things.
101220.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Up Again? Seriously?

101230.Name: Ressurected
101230.Description: Each resurrection can lead to side effects, so make sure you look out for physical well-being!
101230.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Rest in Peace

101240.Name: Realized
101240.Description: Sometimes you realise that not everything you thought you knew is true. But knowledge of any kind is still power.
101240.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Being Immortal

101310.Name: Enemy
101310.Description: Hostilities begin before the first stone is cast.
101310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You're Dead Meat!

101320.Name: Enemy in front
101320.Description:
When the enemy's standing in front of you, don't you wish you could just smack them in the face? 
Wouldn't that be great?
101320.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill Them All

101330.Name: 100,000 soldiers
101330.Description: When people talk about an army of 100,000 men, how many soldiers do they really mean? I mean, who can even count to 100,000...

101340.Name: Monstrous
101340.Description:
Kitted out from head to toe and ready for anything.
Here's to hoping this fight will be a monster!
101340.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I will be the Monster

101410.Name: Fortunate
101410.Description: Some gifts don't come gift-wrapped. Fortune clearly favors you!
101410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Ready for Combat

101420.Name: Planned
101420.Description:
Last time you were saved by raw talent. 
This time you showed everyone what you're made of!
101420.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not On Purpose

101430.Name: Eagle-Eyed
101430.Description: This title is evidence of your prospects.
101430.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not Because You're Weak

101440.Name: Weakness
101440.Description: The solemn duties as a pall bearer should be carried out with dignity and decorum. But when you're only mowing down pawns, it's difficult to conjure up the right level of respect.
101440.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Weakness Hunter

101510.Name: Strong-hearted
101510.Description:
Someone with such audacity surely has nothing to fear from spooks. 
Not even in the face of the most hideous and terrifying things!
101510.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not afraid of Big Weapon

101520.Name: Brave
101520.Description:
A courageous word for a courageous hero! 
Wear this title and your courage can only increase!
101520.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not afraid of Pro

101530.Name: Arrogant
101530.Description: While generally frowned upon, sometimes being impulsive can be useful.
101530.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Know Thyself

101540.Name: Common
101540.Description:
Common can be different things, whether we're finding common ground or fighting for the common good. 
This title doesn't make you the lowest common denominator!
101540.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Common Buster

101610.Name: Lack of 2%
101610.Description:
Even just missing 2% can feel like a whole lot more.
Be strong, fill the gaps and you'll soon be feeling 100% again!
101610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I can make it

101620.Name: Shrunken
101620.Description: Weren't you once bigger than that? Just because you've shrunk on the outside, doesn't mean you're diminished on the inside.
101620.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You are 4000th

101630.Name: Choose
101630.Description: Spoilt for choice? Remember, it's your decision. Hopefully you made the right one.
101630.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Just Me and You

101640.Name: Strong
101640.Description: A powerful title which really underlines your physicality.
101640.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Strong Chaser

101710.Name: Boss-like
101710.Description: You might not be a boss, but you have everything under control!
101710.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Punched Like a Boss...

101720.Name: Middle
101720.Description: Top, middle or bottom? Definitely the top. No, wait! Middle rule. Always go for the middle. I mean bottom.
101720.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Barely Worth It

101730.Name: 2nd
101730.Description: Coming second means being first of the rest! Oh yeah, nothing wrong with number 2.
101730.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Challenge for the 2nd

101740.Name: Middle Boss
101740.Description: You've got your maxi-boss, your mid-boss, your mini-boss and your subwoofer.
101740.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Middle boss Killer

101810.Name: In Sleep
101810.Description: Apparently we only use a fraction of our brains. What a load of hogwash. Still, sometimes you get the impression that your brain's using bits of your body without asking.
101810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Killed in My Sleep

101820.Name: Throne
101820.Description: Your reputation as a great warrior precedes you. Use that wisdom for good and provide a shining example.
101820.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Choose to kill

101830.Name: Boss
101830.Description: Whatever you do in this world, do it right, do it well, do it... like a boss!
101830.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Boss Buster

101840.Name: King
101840.Description: You've dethroned the boss. Now you have to take his place. From now on, you're the king baby!
101840.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Boss Slayer

101910.Name: Bold
101910.Description: Enjoy a little pomp and circumstance and fill your life with bombastic energy. May your enemies shiver and tremble in your presence!
101910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill 100 bosses

101920.Name: Return in triumph
101920.Description: A title for those who always return victorious from battle.
101920.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill 200 bosses

101930.Name: Co-operative
101930.Description: We always achieve more together than alone.
101930.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill 500 bosses

101940.Name: Raid
101940.Description: This title is granted to the true raid master.
101940.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Raid Grandmaster

102010.Name: Horror Doll
102010.Description:
Terrifying mannequins aren't the least of it.
Even regular dolls can be pretty creepy!
102010.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Please Don't Laugh

102020.Name: Balloons
102020.Description: I'd love to grab a balloon and just float away.
102020.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Even In Balloon

102030.Name: Behind the door
102030.Description: They're everywhere! Behind the door, under the bed... help!
102030.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Even Behind the Door

102040.Name: Stone
102040.Description: Those stones by the side of the road are actually mannequins, so be on your guard!
102040.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: How to make a doll

102110.Name: Must Have
102110.Description: When you wear this title you'll make everyone's mouth water.
102110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Got to Wash?

102120.Name: Dirty
102120.Description: Getting dirty is just a fresh opportunity to get clean.
102120.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I can't feel anything

102130.Name: Plughole
102130.Description: When it gets warm in summer, the drains start to smell. And that Junk Pool must smell revolting!
102130.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Call Me Skunk

102140.Name: Junk
102140.Description: Your enemies will wrinkle their noses when you wear this title.
102140.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Soul Junk Cleaner

102210.Name: Distorted
102210.Description: Distorted, twisted, deformed and corrupt. It's life, but not as we know it.
102210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Don't be soft for betrayer

102220.Name: Merciless
102220.Description:
Traitors don't deserve any mercy. 
Once a traitor, always a traitor.
102220.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Keep your revenge secret

102230.Name: Outraged
102230.Description: Anger can send all rationality out of the window. That's the road to chaos. Make sure you don't lose your head.
102230.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Outraged Avenger

102240.Name: NED
102240.Description: To be honest, I'm a fan of the NED Company. They've got the right philosophy.
102240.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Perfect Revenge

102310.Name: Awkward
102310.Description:
The negligent will never achieve anything. 
We should all strive for perfection!
102310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Diet Influencer

102320.Name: Dieting
102320.Description:
‘Starting tomorrow, I'm going on a diet!'
Possibly the first world's most fashionable lie.
102320.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I might get healthier

102330.Name: Healthy
102330.Description: A healthy diet also means doing sport. The two things together are an unbeatable combination, but it's difficult to find the balance.
102330.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I might get fitter

102340.Name: Flame
102340.Description: It doesn't seem possible to extinguish the giant flames from Grand Blaze Taifon.
102340.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Bulks die fast

102410.Name: Deliberate
102410.Description: Planned destruction isn't normally as ruinous as unplanned violence; but it's often more lethal.
102410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Time to smash

102420.Name: Iron
102420.Description: A hero should be valiant and always to hand, always reliable and never liable.
102420.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: The Joy of Destruction

102430.Name: Plamodel
102430.Description:
Plastic models are valuable. 
For hobbyists they're the be all and end all.
102430.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Got to Love Crushing Robot!

102440.Name: Robotic
102440.Description:
The more developed civilizations become, the greater their scientific achievements. 
Today's robots look fantastic, for example. Were they modelled on you perhaps?
102440.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: How to make a robot

102510.Name: Routine
102510.Description:
The more often you see it, the more familiar it becomes!
Maybe you won't be able to do without it soon.

102520.Name: Bloody
102520.Description:
When the bloodthirst overcomes you, your face tells the tale.
A fiery look that could burn holes through concrete.
102520.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: We meet 200 times now

102530.Name: Sweet and bloody
102530.Description: If you're unable to slake your thirst for blood, the cravings only get worse.
102530.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: 500th fights against you

102540.Name: Near
102540.Description: Don't fight amongst yourselves, you have nothing to lose but your chains. SoulWorkers of the world unite!
102540.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Cut 1000 times

102610.Name: Smashing
102610.Description: Sometimes there's nothing better than smashing something up to relieve stress.
102610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Crush all

102620.Name: Guarding
102620.Description: When someone comes wearing a massive suit of armor, they're only laying down the gauntlet. Challenge accepted!
102620.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Love to crush

102630.Name: Unbreakable
102630.Description: Even the charging rhino eventually loses to the wall!
102630.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Nothing is Unbreakable

102640.Name: Armor
102640.Description: D'you think that armour will protect you? Just give me 30 seconds...
102640.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Armor breaker

102710.Name: My arms killing me
102710.Description: Carry out your combos with a flourish. They are evidence of your patience. Your arms and fingers gradually learn to cope with the pain.

102720.Name: Fantastic
102720.Description: When you open your eyes to the fantastic, you will see the fantastic.

102730.Name: Lucky
102730.Description: Fortune favors the brave... say, just how brave are you?
102730.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: 777 Combo The Jackpot

102740.Name: Legendary
102740.Description:
Legendary! There's no need to wait for this one. 
You're the legendary combo king!
102740.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: 999 Combo The Legend

102810.Name: Friendly
102810.Description:
Nice people are good people. 
But they have to be careful they aren't taken advantage of.
102810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: …Do I Look Easy

102820.Name: Blue Question Mark's
102820.Description: I get a warm and cuddly feeling inside when I see blue question marks.
102820.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Hate the blue above someone's head

102830.Name: Previous Life
102830.Description:
Do you believe in resurrection? Or maybe in ghosts? 
Or do you think the end is final?
102830.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Quest, Everywhere

102840.Name: 1000th
102840.Description:
A big round 1,000 has a certain ring to it.
Maybe it's our obsession with the millennium?
102840.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Thousand Wishes

102910.Name: Maze's
102910.Description:
Labyrinths are places where it's mighty fun to get lost! 
A place where you think you're there, when you're actually here, where there used to be.
102910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Walk along the Maze: 200 times

102920.Name: In Maze
102920.Description: When you spend too long in the labyrinth, make sure the labyrinth doesn't become a part of you.
102920.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Finish the Maze: 1500 times

102930.Name: Maze
102930.Description: Running districts sometimes has the feeling of a labyrinth. Hopefully you've got a ball of thread with you. Or maybe a few breadcrumbs...
102930.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Maze Runner

103010.Name: In light
103010.Description:
How does it feel when the light penetrates your soul? 
Like the rays are piercing your body? 
Or shining straight through?
103010.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Do you like instant meals?

103020.Name: Velocity
103020.Description: At the speed of light you could run around the Earth seven times in a second!
103020.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You're good at running

103030.Name: Warp
103030.Description:
With the curvature of space, you can cover a distance in three paces for which others need ten. 
Or do you just have really long legs?
103030.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: How to warp

103040.Name: Speedy
103040.Description: Don't stop, don't think, don't hesitate. You don't have time to prevaricate!
103040.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You are Speed Racer~!

103110.Name: Elite
103110.Description: Pretend you're a member of the fine elite with this title.
103110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You are the best!

103120.Name: Magnificent
103120.Description: You make it all look so effortless!
103120.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You own this game!

103130.Name: First
103130.Description: Want to be the primus inter pares? You'll only get this title for achieving an SS rating 500 times.
103130.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: SS for 500th

103140.Name: Godlike
103140.Description:
Your level of control is almost godlike! 
How do you manage it? It's like you're watching the world in slow motion!
103140.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: God of Control

103210.Name: Dual Pistol's
103210.Description:
Maybe you should set the bar just a little higher? 
As you seem to be collecting F, you've more than earned this title.
103210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: How about chaning weapon?

103220.Name: Strong-willed
103220.Description: It takes a strong will not to despair, but to continue clawing in the F.
103220.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Time for Upgrades!

103230.Name: Strange
103230.Description:
Most people want to see SS on their cards. 
But you know that conformity is the jailer of freedom!
103230.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: This would be an honor

103240.Name: On Purpose
103240.Description:
Any fool can get 100 points, but it takes a real pro to get 0. 
If you look at it that way, SS can't even begin to describe your skills!
103240.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You are trying to lose

103310.Name: Playground
103310.Description:
Playground; noun; a place for children to play in.
Adults can play there just the same, but not without getting some funny looks.
103310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Digging first on playground

103320.Name: Gold
103320.Description: Were you to find a pot of a gold, would you ferret away the money or just stop and marvel at the rainbow?
103320.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Here comes coins

103330.Name: Hundred of battle
103330.Description: Just as it pays to always be ready for the next fight, the next fight should always make sure the next fight pays.
103330.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Importance of Saving

103340.Name: Drop
103340.Description:
There's no such thing as a free lunch.
But just occasionally you find that penny on the ground. No matter how much money you have, it's a great feeling!
103340.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Many a little makes a mickle

103410.Name: Stubborn
103410.Description: Are you doggedly tenacious or just too pigheaded to give in? Who can tell?
103410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Upgrade Me!

103420.Name: Upgrades required
103420.Description: There's a diamond in the rough, you just need to find it. But don't take too long about it, or it'll be gone.
103420.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Better to do some upgrades

103430.Name: Circle
103430.Description:
A circle is a shape with an infinite number of corners. 
And aether has even more corners than a circle.
103430.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Collect marble for..

103440.Name: Ether
103440.Description: Ether is a material which appears like a glowing orb. Not to be confused with ether...
103440.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Ether Collector

103510.Name: Panicbuying
103510.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Impulse Purchase Follower

103520.Name: Compulsive
103520.Description:
Being impulsive can soon have an impact on your savings.
Eventually it becomes almost pathological...
103520.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Impulse buyer

103530.Name: No.1
103530.Description:
Bert's favorite is 6; Ernie's is 8,243,721.
But for me there's only number 1.
103530.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Thanks for the Investment

103610.Name: Another Level
103610.Description: New things can be unsettling. But reaching a new level after intensive training can be as familiar as meeting an old friend.
103610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Getting used to It

103620.Name: Relaxed
103620.Description:
Great diligence is a virtue.
But sometimes things don't have to be perfect, they just have to be finished.
103620.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Fight for fun

103630.Name: Combat
103630.Description:
Combat is a form of dialogue. 
Just ask a married couple and they'll explain it to you.
103630.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Totally used to it

103640.Name: Approved
103640.Description: Approval is a form of recognition which shows that you've reached the next level, both subjectively and objectively.
103640.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Watch me fight

103710.Name: Flexible
103710.Description: Take the time to stretch every day. What's good for the body is good for the soul!
103710.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Release your neck

103720.Name: Hungry
103720.Description:
When you're hungry, you're at your stomach's mercy. 
You start to feel lacklustre and don't have any energy. That's why food is so important!
103720.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: 150 Hours in Cloudream

103730.Name: Insomniac
103730.Description: Not being able to fall asleep is absolute torture! Sleep is precious!
103730.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Better to sleep

103740.Name: Time
103740.Description:
Time is an eternal constant: it cannot be stopped, cannot be slowed, cannot be caught.
So live your life to the full and don't regret a minute of it!
103740.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: 100 Days in Cloudream

103810.Name: Upgrade
103810.Description: The pursuit of upgrades is the embodiment of one's aspiration to improve oneself.
103810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Aura from weapons

103820.Name: Golden
103820.Description:
When someone drapes a gold medal around your neck, you feel like the proverbial goose.
Gold is always good. I mean come on, it's gold!
103820.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Golden Hacker

103910.Name: Next
103910.Description:
Ever tried? Ever failed? No matter.
Try again. Fail again. Fail better!
103910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Waste of Money

103920.Name: This
103920.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Draw a blank

103930.Name: Not Upgraded
103930.Description: Dangling between an upgrade and a downgrade, energized and weak.
103930.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I am getting weak

103940.Name: Legend of
103940.Description:
Congratulations, you've reached a legendary level!
Whatever comes next doesn't matter. They'll never take that away from you.
103940.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Legend of Faliure

104010.Name: Craft
104010.Description:
Crafting is a tricky job.
Depending on the quality and type of materials you use, the results can be completely different.
104010.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Crafting Sponser

104020.Name: Gold
104020.Description: Any element can be converted into another with the right knowledge and expertise. At least, in theory. There are one or two minor hurdles to overcome in practise.
104020.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Alchemist of Gold

104110.Name: Mysterious
104110.Description: Not everything can be explained logically; for some things, we just don't have an answer.
104110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Impressive dismantling

104120.Name: Reset
104120.Description:
With every endeavor you eventually reach a point of no return.
It feels like everything up to this moment was leading to this one decision.
104120.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: No Turning Back

104130.Name: Dismantle is
104130.Description: Be brave! Take the bull by the horns and it'll soon be in pieces!
104130.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Live to dismantle

104140.Name: Minus
104140.Description: A minus is generally considered a bad thing. But minus a minus and you make a plus, right?
104140.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Minus Touch

104210.Name: Thorough
104210.Description: Being thorough is the same as being diligent, but somehow has a colder ring to it.
104210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Rate Your Purchase?

104220.Name: Experienced
104220.Description:
Do something often enough and you'll improve through experience.
Given enough time and practice and anything can become run of the mill.
104220.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Trade Expert

104230.Name: Money
104230.Description: Every time I heard the word ‘money', I hear a certain song in my head...
104230.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Finger on the Pulse

104240.Name: Shopper
104240.Description: Look after your pennies a little. If you go on a wanton shopping spree, you might be surprised how little money is left in your pockets!
104240.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Master Shopper

104310.Name: Gruton's
104310.Description: Grutons have pretty cute faces, but at the end of the day they're still Void Irregulus. Anything which passes the event horizon disappears, never to be seen again. Make sure that you don't fall for/into it!
104310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Natural Enemies

104410.Name: Dilligently
104410.Description:
Why put off till tomorrow what you can get done today?
You eager beaver!

104510.Name: Hidden
104510.Description: Hiding something only makes us more curious to find out what it is.
104510.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Hidden frontier

104610.Name: Illusion
104610.Description: Illusions can sometimes resemble reality. But illusions can break!
104610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Virtual World trainee

104710.Name: Money's
104710.Description: Why do they call it stinking rich? Maybe because you can earn affluence from effluence?
104710.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Money is always right

104810.Name: Zyte's
104810.Description:
Zyte is a member of the Trader Alliance and runs a weapons shop.
He's always a barrel of laughs, but can be quite vain too.
104810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Zyte's VIP

104910.Name: Yomi's
104910.Description:
Yomi is a member of the Trader Alliance and runs a general goods store.
She's pretty shy and retiring, but she opens up when you get to know her better.
104910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Yomi's VIP

105010.Name: Janice's
105010.Description:
Janice is an illegal merchant who deals with the crafting of items.
She can sometimes be standoffish, but maybe she'll loosen up over time.
105010.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Janice's VIP

105110.Name: Trisha's
105110.Description:
Trisha is an illegal merchant who deals with upgrading items.
She is warm, generous and a complete scatterbrain.
105110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Trisha's VIP

105210.Name: Ajin's
105210.Description:
Ajin is a Color Sergeant in the Starry Forest League in District 6.
She comes across as very cold and calculating.
105210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Ajin's VIP

105310.Name: Distorted World's
105310.Description: The warped world looks like the real one observed through a hall of mirrors. At once different, yet somehow familiar.
105310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Wheel of distorted world

105410.Name: Golden World's
105410.Description: In a world full of gold, the streets would be strewn with nuggets.
105410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Ressistance of Gold World

105510.Name: Lonesome World's
105510.Description: A landscape bleak and bare is often described as rugged.
105510.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Conqueror of Lonesome World

105610.Name: Marionette
105610.Description: Staring into the eyes of a marionette can be a fascinating yet terrifying experience.
105610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Mannequin Leader

105710.Name: Violet
105710.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Violet Spider Queen

105810.Name: Black
105810.Description: A title for those who flatter into the darkness without a shadow of hope.
105810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Black Shadows

105910.Name: Incomplete
105910.Description: An unfinished idea sits at the back of my mind, unfurling itself, spreading, making the back of my neck itch. But that's no reason to dig it out.
105910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Incomplete Enemy

106010.Name: Golden
106010.Description: All that glitters may not be gold, but it's at least worth having a look.
106010.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Golden Irregular

106110.Name: Secret
106110.Description: Even with the whole world lying open like a book, the explorer discovers new pages to read.
106110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Part of the Family

106210.Name: Beginning
106210.Description: Every new shoot of spring is the incarnation of new life and the start of something new!
106210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Hear to Grow

106310.Name: Moving
106310.Description: Small changes can bring about the biggest upheavals.
106310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Hear to Move

106410.Name: Growing
106410.Description:
Growth encompasses learning and experiencing new things. Joy and sorrow are two poles betwixt which we shuttle.
And learning to accept this allows us to thrive.
106410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I love Potting

106510.Name: Blooming
106510.Description:
Once in full bloom, everything is open and full of vibrancy.
In this state, the grandeur of life can shine in all its resplendent beauty.
106510.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Blooming Joy

106610.Name: Starter
106610.Description:
Talent is made, not born.
Everyone has to start somewhere!
106610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Enjoy to farm

106710.Name: Self-sufficient
106710.Description: Self-sufficient people supply themselves with everything they need. It's an even higher form of self-reliance, and proof that it is possible to live life as an individual.

106810.Name: Doing
106810.Description:
When you tackle things head on, you can learn a lot at once.
That's why there's no harm in getting stuck in even if you're not sure what you're doing is right.
106810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Born to farm

106910.Name: Great
106910.Description: You are a giant among men. This title is granted to you in light of your agricultural accomplishments.
106910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Great Farmer

107010.Name: Golden Time
107010.Description: The golden hour is that period of time following an accident or catastrophe when there's still a high likelihood of preventing death. This title is awarded to farmers who maybe enjoyed their actual bed more than the flower beds. Who thinks of the plants?!
107010.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Golden Time Gardener

107110.Name: Fertile
107110.Description:
Fertiliser is an essential ingredient in food cultivation.
But for a successful harvest you need to do more than just bury things in fertiliser.
107110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Fertilizer Producer

107210.Name: Helpful
107210.Description: Being ready to help means being there to help your fellow mortals and not treating them as another race of creatures. It is a word filled with charity and warmth.
107210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Planting Together

107310.Name: Together
107310.Description: Working together to a common aim gives you the energy to do those things you need to do alone. And if you can't manage something alone, there's nothing shameful in asking others for help.
107310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Planting Step by step

107410.Name: Charitable
107410.Description: Charitable people share the warmth they carry with them in their hearts with others. Even the very word charity itself brings warmth to those who hear it.
107410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Planting Step by step

107510.Name: God
107510.Description:
People who do benevolent deeds are sometimes compared with deities.
This title is awarded for your charitable generosity.
107510.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: May God Bless Planting

107610.Name: Vacuum
107610.Description: If you hadn't closed the Rift of Vacuum in District 6, the influence of the Soul Junks would have been much stronger.
107610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: It's like Clo..Never mind

107710.Name: District 6's
107710.Description: This creature threatens to destroy the entire planet. Your heroic deeds have made you the saviour of District 6.
107710.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Call of The Thing

107810.Name: Disaster's
107810.Description:
This creature will bring about the downfall of the entire planet.
You have brought it to task and in so doing saved the world.
107810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Primitive Fear

107910.Name: Alternate Vacuum
107910.Description:
Title for players who overcome the Casual Raid and again.
Things are slightly more peaceful in Cloudream now, right?
107910.HowToUnlock: DS Reward for the Apocalypse Raid

200100.Name: Soul Worker
200100.Description: Awesome, you're now a Soul Worker!
200100.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Comeback Home

200201.Name: Devotion
200201.Description:
To make dreams come true, We experience a lot with various feelings.
The goal just depends on decision on their own.
200201.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Honorable Sacrifice

200202.Name: Ego
200202.Description:
To make dreams come true, We experience a lot with various feelings.
The goal just depends on decision on their own.
200202.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Honorable Sacrifice

200203.Name: Safety
200203.Description:
To make dreams come true, We experience a lot with various feelings.
The goal just depends on decision on their own.
200203.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Honorable Sacrifice

200204.Name: Resignation
200204.Description:
To make dreams come true, We experience a lot with various feelings.
The goal just depends on decision on their own.
200204.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Honorable Sacrifice

200205.Name: Relief
200205.Description:
To make dreams come true, We experience a lot with various feelings.
The goal just depends on decision on their own.
200205.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Honorable Sacrifice

200206.Name: Sacrifice
200206.Description:
To make dreams come true, We experience a lot with various feelings.
The goal just depends on decision on their own.
200206.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Honorable Sacrifice

200300.Name: Rest in Peace
200300.Description: A well-earned rest is an opportunity to recuperate and reflect on battles fought and won. A time for respite for those minds plagued by thought.
200300.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Black Armor

200401.Name: Blade
200401.Description:
Boys and girls' brandish weapons with grief.
Would be relief their heart?
200401.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

200402.Name: Bullet
200402.Description:
Boys and girls' brandish weapons with grief.
Would be relief their heart?
200402.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

200403.Name: Scythe
200403.Description:
Boys and girls' brandish weapons with grief.
Would be relief their heart?
200403.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

200404.Name: Fist
200404.Description:
Boys and girls' brandish weapons with grief.
Would be relief their heart?
200404.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

200405.Name: Melody
200405.Description:
Boys and girls' brandish weapons with grief.
Would be relief their heart?
200405.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

200406.Name: Cannon
200406.Description:
Boys and girls' brandish weapons with grief.
Would be relief their heart?
200406.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Sorrowful Sky

200500.Name: Loser
200500.Description:
How does it feel to conquer the firmament?
Do you feel like a king of the celestial plane? 
Oh, if I could but win just once!
200500.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: If you smile

200600.Name: Judge
200600.Description: We always reap the results of our deeds, be it a reward or a punishment. That includes those who are aware of no wrong-doing but who don't follow the divine path.
200600.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Quest: Hundred Swords

200700.Name: Tie
200700.Description: Nobody knows where, when and how the destinies of two people are intertwined. Keep your eyes open at all times!

200801.Name: Lost Girl
200801.Description:
Those boys and girls who have been carried along their own destiny.
What kind of decisions will they make now?
To Obey or refuse. 
The time will come soon.

200802.Name: Lost Boy
200802.Description:
Those boys and girls who have been carried along their own destiny.
What kind of decisions will they make now?
To Obey or refuse. 
The time will come soon.

200803.Name: Lost Girl
200803.Description:
Those boys and girls who have been carried along their own destiny.
What kind of decisions will they make now?
To Obey or refuse. 
The time will come soon.

200804.Name: Lost Boy
200804.Description:
Those boys and girls who have been carried along their own destiny.
What kind of decisions will they make now?
To Obey or refuse. 
The time will come soon.

200805.Name: Lost Girl
200805.Description:
Those boys and girls who have been carried along their own destiny.
What kind of decisions will they make now?
To Obey or refuse. 
The time will come soon.

200806.Name: Lost Girl
200806.Description:
Those boys and girls who have been carried along their own destiny.
What kind of decisions will they make now?
To Obey or refuse. 
The time will come soon.

200910.Name: Master
200910.Description: It's difficult to really master a skill, but you'll be proud as punch when you manage it!
200910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Dealing with…?

200920.Name: Injured
200920.Description:
Casualties should always be taken to hospital as quickly as possible.
First aid will only get you so far.
200920.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Why don't you getting a medical checkup?

200930.Name: Consumer
200930.Description:
Consumers have rights of their own.
Learn about your rights and don't be afraid to use them!
200930.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You're Welcome to Consume

201010.Name: Pioneer
201010.Description:
A title for pioneers.
Sometimes you just want to be able to say you were the first to do something.

201020.Name: Regular
201020.Description: It goes without saying that the food or goods need to be of decent quality, but you'll only earn regular customers if your staff are competent and speak to the customers' needs.
201020.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Any discount for a regular?

201030.Name: VIP
201030.Description: Receipt of these three letters is cause for celebration.
201030.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: All Mine!

201040.Name: VVIP
201040.Description: Add another V to your title and show the world how veritably vital you are.
201040.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Merchants' Union VVIP

201110.Name: Owner of Weapon
201110.Description:
Weapons collectors are usually pretty demanding individuals.
When their toys break, they're lovingly repaired and restored, rather than being thrown away. And they should look also the business...
201110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Being afraid of gone

201120.Name: Weapon Collector
201120.Description: Fanatics are people who just can't get enough of something.
201120.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Good Old Indestructible

201130.Name: Big hand
201130.Description: What can you tell about a person who wears big gloves? Big hands.
201130.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Forever Repairs

201210.Name: Loser
201210.Description: Stay on the ball as long as it takes to turn from being a loser to a winner!
201210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Cold Floor

201220.Name: Homeless
201220.Description:
Sleeping rough costs a lot of HP.
Houses are a fantastic invention!
201220.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Up Again? Seriously?

201230.Name: Corpse
201230.Description:
When the dead walk among the living, they usually can't keep their old form. 
Watch out for yourself and make sure they don't overwhelm you.
201230.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Rest in Peace

201240.Name: Immortal
201240.Description: The immortal cannot die, whatever happens. If you select this title, even death himself will give you a wide berth! Maybe...
201240.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Being Immortal

201310.Name: Sweeper
201310.Description:
It isn't easy cleaning up all the time!
And don't even talk to me about back trouble. But look at that shine!
201310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You're Dead Meat!

201320.Name: Eliminater
201320.Description: The word ‘obliterate' means to blot something out, to erase it, to make it disappear... to literally strike out the letters!
201320.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill Them All

201330.Name: Defeat the enemy
201330.Description: After talking about annihilation, vindication doesn't seem half as bad.

201340.Name: Monster
201340.Description:
Kitted out from head to toe and ready for anything.
Here's to hoping this fight will be a monster!
201340.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I will be the Monster

201410.Name: Expert
201410.Description:
People with extraordinary skills are usually called experts in their field. I wonder why?
Maybe ‘someone with extraordinary skills' is a bit of a mouthful...
201410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Ready for Combat

201420.Name: Beneficiary
201420.Description:
A beneficiary is generally the recipient of a certain benefit.
Even if that doesn't apply in your case, it doesn't stop you from wearing this title.
201420.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not On Purpose

201430.Name: Warrior
201430.Description: Fight bravely, fight honourably – fight like a warrior!
201430.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not Because You're Weak

201440.Name: Hunter
201440.Description: Sometimes the hunter becomes the hunted. And the hunted?
201440.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Weakness Hunter

201510.Name: Proletarian
201510.Description: In the fullness of time the intrinsic dialectical contradictions of the system will see the culmination of the material struggle between the bourgeoisie and the proletariat.
201510.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not afraid of Big Weapon

201520.Name: Citizen
201520.Description:
Now you have joined the ranks of honourable citizens of Cloudream.
It might come as a surprise, but congratulations!
201520.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Not afraid of Pro

201530.Name: Contender
201530.Description:
He who seeks challenge, rather than waiting for challenge to find him, knows the value of living.
And you are such a person, Soul Worker!
201530.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Know Thyself

201540.Name: Buster
201540.Description: ‘Buster' is a suffix used in many contexts to denote destruction. Gangs, blocks, ghosts, trusts... even dust! What will your sobriquet be?
201540.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Common Buster

201610.Name: Solace
201610.Description: Don't worry, everything will work out alright! That's how you give solace.
201610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I can make it

201620.Name: Stronger
201620.Description: You cut through your enemies like straw.
201620.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: You are 4000th

201630.Name: Huntsman
201630.Description: Trappers act very differently, depending on their quarry.
201630.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Just Me and You

201640.Name: Chaser
201640.Description: Stalkers go boldly where others fear to tread.
201640.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Strong Chaser

201710.Name: Second
201710.Description: You've fought bravely. There's nothing wrong with being second!
201710.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Punched Like a Boss...

201720.Name: Challenger
201720.Description: The challenger can be an individual or an entire group.
201720.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Barely Worth It

201730.Name: Wishful
201730.Description: People can be divided into those who run, and those who give chase.
201730.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Challenge for the 2nd

201740.Name: Killer
201740.Description:
Killers move with stealth through the shadows.
That's the way it has to be.
201740.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Middle boss Killer

201810.Name: Tracer
201810.Description: When in pursuit, you always need to keep your eyes on the path and your nose to the ground.
201810.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Killed in My Sleep

201820.Name: Threat
201820.Description: Hopefully you can instil even more fear in your enemies' hearts wearing this!
201820.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Choose to kill

201830.Name: Tracker
201830.Description: Every broken trick, every fallen leaf. You were born for the chase.
201830.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Boss Buster

201840.Name: Slayer
201840.Description:
Reminds me of a series I once saw.
East something or other.
201840.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Boss Slayer

201910.Name: Player
201910.Description: Put your back into it and leave those novices in the dust!
201910.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill 100 bosses

201920.Name: General
201920.Description:
General! The enemy general has been eliminated!
Congratulations!
201920.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill 200 bosses

201930.Name: Glory
201930.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Kill 500 bosses

201940.Name: Raid Master
201940.Description: The title of master has been awarded to you for successfully completing the raid.
201940.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Raid Grandmaster

202010.Name: Evader
202010.Description: Shirkers always try to wangle their out of doing unpleasant duties.
202010.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Please Don't Laugh

202020.Name: Bomber
202020.Description: Tearing through your enemies like that will earn you an ominous nickname. Or you might sound like a kitchen utensil.
202020.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Even In Balloon

202030.Name: Clairvoyant
202030.Description:
What sort of eyesight do you need to be able to see through walls?
40/20?
202030.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Even Behind the Door

202040.Name: Destroyer
202040.Description: Destroyers need to avoid causing too much collateral damage. Most of the time.
202040.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: How to make a doll

202110.Name: Shower
202110.Description: Take a long hot soak in the bath at the end of the day and feel the stress melt away!
202110.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Got to Wash?

202120.Name: Sense
202120.Description: The relentless onslaught of countless adventures deadens and dulls your feelings.
202120.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I can't feel anything

202130.Name: Resident
202130.Description:
Get as familiar as you want with the sewerage system, just don't move in there.
It's impossible to get rid of the stench afterwards.
202130.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Call Me Skunk

202140.Name: Cleaner
202140.Description: If only someone would invent a machine to get rid of the stench of those Soul Junks!
202140.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Soul Junk Cleaner

202210.Name: Confidence
202210.Description:
Finding someone you can really trust is a difficult business.
It only takes a single loose word to destroy many years of trust.
202210.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Don't be soft for betrayer

202220.Name: Rage
202220.Description: Giving in to hate can lead to you becoming ever more vulnerable than your enemy. But what you gonna do? Haters gotta hate!
202220.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Keep your revenge secret

202230.Name: Avenger
202230.Description: When the red mist falls, beware!
202230.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Outraged Avenger

202240.Name: Revenger
202240.Description: Vengeance is sweet... and you shall have yours!
202240.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Perfect Revenge

202310.Name: Firefighter
202310.Description: Firefighters are true heroes, risking their lives to fight the flames.
202310.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Diet Influencer

202320.Name: Dreamer
202320.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I might get healthier

202330.Name: Trainer
202330.Description: Sometimes you get the feeling that your coach can get just a little too enthusiastic when you're on a training regime.
202330.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: I might get fitter

202340.Name: Fighter
202340.Description: There are many ways to be a fighter. Deep down inside, we're all fighters at heart.
202340.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Bulks die fast

202410.Name: Vandal
202410.Description: When rampaging around, take care not to injure your allies!
202410.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Time to smash

202420.Name: Destory
202420.Description: Destroying anything and everything that gets in your way won't win you many friends.
202420.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: The Joy of Destruction

202430.Name: Smasher
202430.Description: Some people completely lose the plot when you take their toys out of the original packaging.
202430.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Got to Love Crushing Robot!

202440.Name: Engineer
202440.Description: No expertise required to use this title!
202440.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: How to make a robot

202510.Name: Associate
202510.Description: The foundation of any good relationship is regular contact.

202520.Name: Friendship
202520.Description: Meeting regularly and learning to trust one another is the key to real friendship.
202520.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: We meet 200 times now

202530.Name: Buddy
202530.Description:
If you can fight 500 times, and end each bout with a smile,
Yours is Cloudream, and everything that's in it.
202530.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: 500th fights against you

202540.Name: Friends
202540.Description: Friendship is precious and deserves to be fostered!
202540.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Cut 1000 times

202610.Name: Goodman
202610.Description: It's important to have something worth dying for.
202610.HowToUnlock: Reward for the Achievement: Crush all

202620.Name: Basher
202620.Description:
